title: Crime Alert 10.13.21
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.13.21
description:
A senior citizen talks a teen into a "sex contract." A woman gets mad at her boyfriend and hits him with a hot pan of grits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
